description: faded image of a woman's head and shoulders in an off-white color with hair that is pulled back and falls to the shoulders; background is a faded, washed out red; on the reverse of the print is a crossed out image of a man with his arm raised to his head and thick red printing on the bottom half of the print
inscription: LL of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar. Einziges Exemplar son Fassung. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert E 91-A-1 Stein | LR of sheet, in pencil: Mit herzlichen Weihnachtsgrüssen von / Sonia und Walter Gramatté.
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23
title: Woman's Head (Sonia Gramatté)
